meanings.definition: Most impressive in size, appearance, or general effect.
meanings.sent1: The elephant was the grandest animal at the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The grandest building in town is the new library.
meanings.sent3: The grandest cake at the party was shaped like a castle.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the grandest ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The grandest fireworks display lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: Most important or magnificent in character, quality, or power.
meanings.sent1: The grandest moment of the play was when the hero saved the day.
meanings.sent2: She received the grandest award for her outstanding achievements.
meanings.sent3: The grandest joke of the night had everyone laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: His grandest dream was to travel the world and help those in need.
meanings.sent5: The grandest mountain peak stood tall against the blue sky.
